Gaze Guard - No More Fitnah 

Our tool helps Muslims maintain modesty by automatically blurring the opposite gender on platforms like YouTube, Netflix, Instagram, and Reddit. With a powerful database of 250 million images and an industry-leading response time of 0.02 seconds, it's the fastest tool available for filtering out inappropriate content. Stay focused on your faith without compromising your online experience with unique features like body tracking for a fitnah-free surfing experience.
